<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/user-svc/organization/{organizationId}/user/{userId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Allows and organization admint to add a user to an organization.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Organization ID","in":"path","name":"organizationId","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"description":"User ID","in":"path","name":"userId","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}},"description":"Add User to Organization Request"}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
